page.title: 09Interview with Stoke lady
page.content: Mrs Hancock said that she liked living in Stoke and that she would not move. The shops are very close and so she can walk to them to do her shopping.She did say that she would like more clothes shops. Living near to factories did not bother her.Her husband works at the Michelin factory and she works at Stoke police station. Mrs Hancock lives near to the football ground.She doesn't like the fact that people park their cars along her street.Also after a match there is a lot of litter. In the evenings,she said,that there was plenty to do.There are plenty of pubs and social clubs to go to.
